FR.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
FR.description: Un grand malheur frappe le village de Horo-Horo : la princesse bien-aimée a disparu. Et sans ses pouvoirs, des sauterelles géantes viendront tout dévaster ! Tous les espoirs reposent sur les deux gardiens ninja du village, Kid Ying et Dr Yang. Ying, jeune ninja mystique et hardi, taillade ses ennemis en chevauchant son tigre. Yang, son mentor aux grands pouvoirs, maîtrise l'art de la transformation spirituelle. Ensemble, ils doivent traverser les dix niveaux du Dragon pour retrouver la princesse... quitte à y laisser la vie. Pour avancer, vous devrez maîtriser des dizaines d'attaques et résoudre des énigmes magiques. Affrontez des ennemis retors, comme Carp Meister, qui étourdit ses victimes à l'aide de poissons empoisonnés, ou la Sumo Tag Team, rois de l'implacable technique dite du coup de ventre. Mais ce n'est rien comparé au reste. Dans cette quête, la force suprême viendra de votre esprit, non de vos muscles. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CH.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
CH.description: Ein Fluch liegt auf der Stadt Horo-Horo. Die von allen geliebte Prinzessin ist verschwunden. Und ohne deren Kräfte wird eine Heuschreckenplage die hilflose Stadt heimsuchen. Der Untergang droht! Alle Hoffnung liegt jetzt auf den beiden Ninja-Wächtern der Stadt, Kid Ying und Dr. Yang. Ying ist ein junger, mutiger Mystik-Ninja, Yang sein mächtiger Mentor und Meister der transzendenten Bewusstseinstransformation. Zusammen müssen sie die zehn Level der Drachenbestie durchsuchen und dürfen nicht eher ruhen, bis sie die Prinzessin gefunden haben. Ein irrwitziges Abenteuer mit völlig verrückten Gegnern wartet auf dich! Da ist der Karpfen-Meister, der seine Opfer mit giftigen Kampffischen jagt, oder das Sumo Tag Team, die Könige des knallharten Magenhakens. Aber das ist nur die Spitze des Eisbergs - deswegen hängt deine Stärke letztendlich nicht von deinen Muckis, sondern von deinem Köpfchen ab. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

CY.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
CY.description: A curse has stricken the village of Horo-Horo. Their beloved princess has vanished – and without her powers, a plague of giant locusts will ravage the helpless. All hope rests on the village’s two ninja guardians, Kid Ying and Dr. Yang. Ying is a daring young mystical ninja, and Yang is his all-powerful mentor, master of the invincible spirit transformation. Together they must overcome ten levels of the Dragonbeast to find the princess – or die trying. You’ll need to perform dozens of attack moves and solve magical problems before advancing. And talk about enemies! There’s the Carp Meister, who stuns victims with poisonous fighting fish, or the Sumo Tag Team, kings of the unbeatable belly buster crunch. But that’s only the tip of the volcano – which is why your ultimate strength must come not from your might, but from your mind. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
BG.description: A curse has stricken the village of Horo-Horo. Their beloved princess has vanished – and without her powers, a plague of giant locusts will ravage the helpless. BR.name: The Legend of The Mystical Ninja
BR.description: Um ninja místico de verdade precisa provar o seu valor com seu cérebro, não com força! Controle Kid Ying e Dr. Yang em uma ação de aventura através do Japão feudal! Supere 10 níveis de Dragonbeast para salvar a princesa Yuki, lutando por intensas fases em áreas 3D e 2D, repletas de personagens pitorescos e divertidos minijogos!

BE.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
BE.description: Un grand malheur frappe le village de Horo-Horo : la princesse bien-aimée a disparu. Et sans ses pouvoirs, des sauterelles géantes viendront tout dévaster ! AT.description: Ein Fluch liegt auf der Stadt Horo-Horo. Die von allen geliebte Prinzessin ist verschwunden. Und ohne deren Kräfte wird eine Heuschreckenplage die hilflose Stadt heimsuchen. ES.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
ES.description: Ha caído una maldición sobre el pueblo de Horo-Horo: su amada princesa ha desaparecido y, sin sus poderes, una plaga de langostas lo arrasará sin remedio. ¡Son malas noticias! Ahora, todas las esperanzas del pueblo están puestas en los dos ninjas guardianes, Kid Ying y Dr. Yang. Ying es un joven y valiente ninja místico, y Yang es su poderoso mentor y maestro de la invencible transformación del espíritu. Juntos, deberán superar los diez niveles de la bestia dragón hasta dar con la princesa... o morir en el intento. Tendrás que efectuar decenas de movimientos de ataque y resolver problemas mágicos para poder avanzar. ¡Y también habrá enemigos! Está Carp Meister, que deja a sus víctimas inconscientes con su ataque de pescado venenoso. O los Sumo Tag Team, reyes del aplastamiento con barriga. Pero eso solo es la punta del iceberg, por eso tu verdadera fortaleza debe proceder de la mente, no de los brazos. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego.

DE.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
DE.description: Ein Fluch liegt auf der Stadt Horo-Horo. Die von allen geliebte Prinzessin ist verschwunden. Und ohne deren Kräfte wird eine Heuschreckenplage die hilflose Stadt heimsuchen. CA.name: The Legend of The Mystical Ninja
CA.description: A true mystical ninja must prove their worth with their brain, not brawn! Take control of Kid Ying and Dr. Yang in an action adventure through feudal Japan! Overcome 10 levels of the Dragonbeast to save Princess Yuki, battling through stages of intense 3-D and 2-D zones filled with zany characters and fun minigames!

DK.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
DK.description: A curse has stricken the village of Horo-Horo. Their beloved princess has vanished – and without her powers, a plague of giant locusts will ravage the helpless. MX.name: The Legend of The Mystical Ninja
MX.description: ¡Un verdadero ninja místico debe probar su valor con la mente, no con la fuerza! Juega como Kid Ying y Dr. Yang en esta aventura de acción desarrollada en Japón feudal. Deberás superar 10 niveles de Dragonbeast para salvar a la princesa Yuki. Intensos enfrentamientos te esperan en escenarios con zonas 3D y 2D con alocados personajes y divertidos minijuegos.

SE.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
SE.description: A curse has stricken the village of Horo-Horo. Their beloved princess has vanished – and without her powers, a plague of giant locusts will ravage the helpless. All hope rests on the village’s two ninja guardians, Kid Ying and Dr. Yang. Ying is a daring young mystical ninja, and Yang is his all-powerful mentor, master of the invincible spirit transformation. Together they must overcome ten levels of the Dragonbeast to find the princess – or die trying. You’ll need to perform dozens of attack moves and solve magical problems before advancing. And talk about enemies! There’s the Carp Meister, who stuns victims with poisonous fighting fish, or the Sumo Tag Team, kings of the unbeatable belly buster crunch. But that’s only the tip of the volcano – which is why your ultimate strength must come not from your might, but from your mind. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
PT.description: Uma maldição caiu sobre a vila Horo-Horo e a sua adorada princesa desapareceu. A esperança reside agora nos guardiães da vila: Kid Ying e Dr. Yang. Esta aventura de ação da popular série Goemon é uma história simples para um ou dois jogadores na qual tens de explorar cidades em busca de pistas, participar em minijogos e aprender novos movimentos. Podes até lutar nas secções das plataformas para derrotares o vilão de cada nível! Repleto de humor e de folclore japonês, The Legend of the Mystical Ninja é um clássico extravagante! Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA.

MT.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
MT.description: A curse has stricken the village of Horo-Horo. Their beloved princess has vanished – and without her powers, a plague of giant locusts will ravage the helpless. All hope rests on the village’s two ninja guardians, Kid Ying and Dr. Yang. Ying is a daring young mystical ninja, and Yang is his all-powerful mentor, master of the invincible spirit transformation. Together they must overcome ten levels of the Dragonbeast to find the princess – or die trying. You’ll need to perform dozens of attack moves and solve magical problems before advancing. And talk about enemies! There’s the Carp Meister, who stuns victims with poisonous fighting fish, or the Sumo Tag Team, kings of the unbeatable belly buster crunch. But that’s only the tip of the volcano – which is why your ultimate strength must come not from your might, but from your mind. This is the US version of the game.

RU.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
RU.description: На деревню Horo-Horo пало проклятие, и обожаемая народом принцесса исчезла. У несчастных жителей осталась одна надежда, а точнее две: Kid Ying и Dr. Yang, деревенские стражи порядка. Веселый приключенческий экшн-платформер из популярной серии Goemon можно проходить в одиночку или вдвоем. Ищите в городах подсказки, играйте в мини-игры и осваивайте новые боевые приемы, а потом прокладывайте путь через полчища врагов, чтобы в конце уровня сразиться с боссом. Благодаря искрометному юмору и вкраплениям японского фольклора The Legend of the Mystical Ninja заняла особое место в ряду классических игр! Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США.

NL.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
NL.description: Er rust een vloek op het dorpje Horo-Horo! De prinses is verdwenen, en zonder haar zijn de dorpsbewoners machteloos tegenover een plaag van gigantische sprinkhanen. De laatste hoop is gevestigd op Kid Ying en Dr. Yang, de twee beschermninja’s van het dorp. Ying is een jonge, moedige ninja, en Yang is zijn oppermachtige mentor en meester in de geestestransformatie. Samen moeten ze de tien levels van het Dragonbeast overwinnen, tot ze de prinses hebben gevonden... of sterven tijdens hun poging. Je moet vechten voor je leven en magische raadsels oplossen. Je vijanden: de Carp Meister, die zijn slachtoffers uitschakelt met giftige vechtvissen, en het Sumo Tag Team, bekend van de onverslaanbare Belly Buster Crunch! Zij zijn slechts het topje van de ijsberg. Daarom moet je kracht uiteindelijk niet vanuit je lichaam komen, maar vanuit je geest! Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel.

NZ.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
NZ.description: A curse has stricken the village of Horo-Horo. Their beloved princess has vanished – and without her powers, a plague of giant locusts will ravage the helpless. All hope rests on the village’s two ninja guardians, Kid Ying and Dr. Yang. Ying is a daring young mystical ninja, and Yang is his all-powerful mentor, master of the invincible spirit transformation. But that’s only the tip of the volcano – which is why your ultimate strength must come not from your might, but from your mind. This is the US version of the game.

IT.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
IT.description: Una maledizione ha colpito il villaggio di Horo-Horo. L'adorata principessa è sparita e, senza i suoi poteri, uno sciame di locuste giganti si abbatterà sugli indifesi abitanti. Che tragedia! Kid Ying e Dr. Yang, i due guardiani ninja del villaggio, sono l'unica speranza della popolazione. Ying è un giovane e coraggioso ninja che ha l'abitudine di fare a pezzi i nemici mentre cavalca una tigre psichedelica. Yang è il suo potentissimo mentore e maestro dell'invincibile trasformazione spirituale. Insieme dovranno superare i dieci livelli del Drago e salvare la principessa... o perire. Dovrai sbizzarrirti con dozzine di mosse offensive diverse e risolvere gli enigmi magici che bloccheranno il tuo cammino. Per non parlare dei nemici! C'è il Carp Meister, che stordisce i nemici con dei pesci combattenti velenosi, e i membri della Sumo Tag Team, maestri del micidiale volo dell'angelo grasso. Ma questa è solo la cima del vulcano. Ed è per questo che la tua arma migliore non sarà la forza, ma la mente. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

SI.name: The Legend of the Mystical Ninja™
SI.description: A curse has stricken the village of Horo-Horo. Their beloved princess has vanished – and without her powers, a plague of giant locusts will ravage the helpless. All hope rests on the village’s two ninja guardians, Kid Ying and Dr. Yang. Ying is a daring young mystical ninja, and Yang is his all-powerful mentor, master of the invincible spirit transformation. Together they must overcome ten levels of the Dragonbeast to find the princess – or die trying. You’ll need to perform dozens of attack moves and solve magical problems before advancing. And talk about enemies! There’s the Carp Meister, who stuns victims with poisonous fighting fish, or the Sumo Tag Team, kings of the unbeatable belly buster crunch. But that’s only the tip of the volcano – which is why your ultimate strength must come not from your might, but from your mind. This is the US version of the game.

US.name: The Legend of The Mystical Ninja
US.description: A true mystical ninja must prove their worth with their brain, not brawn! Take control of Kid Ying and Dr. Yang in an action adventure through feudal Japan! Overcome 10 levels of the Dragonbeast to save Princess Yuki, battling through stages of intense 3-D and 2-D zones filled with zany characters and fun minigames!

But that’s only the tip of the volcano – which is why your ultimate strength must come not from your might, but from your mind. This is the US version of the game.
